https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a description of this live paper section.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.label: Description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO._instruction: Add the live paper version this live paper section is part of.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.label: Is part of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name (or title) of this live paper section.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/order._instruction: Enter an integer that is used to sort this live paper section in ascending order with other live paper sections of the overarching live paper version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/order.label: Order
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/order.name: order

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add the type of this live paper section (e.g., 'custom', 'generic', 'models', 'morphology', or 'traces').
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
